Indonesian: advokat from Dutch advocaat, pengacara (means 'master of ceremonies' in Malay)

Malay: perundangan (In Indonesian, it means legislation), legislatif

Indonesian: izin, ijin from Arabic idhn, lisensi from Dutch licentie
Lisboa from Portuguese, Lisabon influenced by Dutch Lissabon
Truk (from American English: 'truck'), prahoto from Dutch vrachtauto
